body: These labels are applied automatically when the issues are created. See [this request](https://github.community/t5/How-to-use-Git-and-GitHub/Apply-labels-automatically-at-issue-creation/td-p/10719) and the corresponding [docs](https://help.github.com/articles/manually-creating-a-single-issue-template-for-your-repository/).
title: Added labels in github issue templates
